Welcome to the Research Software Encyclopedia!

The Research Software Encyclopedia (rse) is software to query and otherwise interact with a database of research software, and a research software taxonomy. It is intended for research software engineers to be able to better qualify and quantify the work that they do.

The module is licensed under the MPL 2.0 LICENSE.
